website_summaries.verdict: While it's a tough hand truck for some loads, and is easy to assemble and change positions, it also comes with some durability and maximum weight limit concerns.
pros: Fairly lightweight compared others in its weight range
Easy to convert into different positions
cons: Although rated at a 1,000-pound capacity, handle, wheels and casters have buckled or broken under less weight
Hard to maneuver with very heavy loads

customer_reviews.title: HAND TRUCK WILL FAIL UNDER HEAVY LOAD- VERY FLIMSY
customer_reviews.text: This Hand Truck is complete junk, very flimsy, and NOT rated properly. Right out of the box I was suspicious due to the very thin aluminum construction, small support frame, and very flimsy plastic handles. I confirmed the rating sticker on the cart showed a 800 lb capacity in hand truck mode and 1000 lb capacity in cart mode. I moved a gun safe, well under the 1000 lb rating using the hand truck in cart mode as recommended. The small caster wheels buckled, the frame supports bent, the wheel supports bent, and the rivets snapped. This cart is not engineered properly and will get somebody hurt if moving anything heavy. This is going back after just one use!
customer_reviews.author: Subdiver

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, one of the handles broke after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: DCWorkingMommy

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up to its weight rating...
customer_reviews.text: Used this dolly to move a 600lbs safe and the axle bent. Did not go down stairs or any rough surfaces. Safe is rated for 1000lbs in the description, did not see it specify if it needs to be in any certain position to meet that capability. Item is no longer eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Donovan

customer_reviews.title: It's a great looking design
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product, especially for the inflated price. Not only did mine arrive with an already broken wheel hub which Amazon had no replacements for, the first time I put any serious weight on it (maybe 350 lbs) and started pushing it up an inclined driveway, the handles snapped right off. It's a great looking design, sure, which is why I bought it, but it doesn't take the weight. Very thin aluminum. My advice is to buy a steel hand truck. I'm on my 4th hand truck now and have learned that lesson well. Go with steel.
customer_reviews.author: aidan pryde

customer_reviews.title: Wheel came off!
customer_reviews.text: One of the small wheels came off within a week. Good and light weight and cannot handle heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Shoaib

customer_reviews.title: Apart at the seams....
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart within first month at 3 weak links... ok maybe for lighter loads, but nowhere near limits set in advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Pohtilla

customer_reviews.title: A sweet ride for your boxes
customer_reviews.text: Really neat. The incline position works great for most of my purposes. Just be careful with the foot, making sure you don't stress it too much. I suggest making sure you hold heavy items against the frame (pulling back on the item, not the handles when you are leaning back in the 2 wheel mode). The wheels are solid, yet it seems very much like air tires for smooth rolling. I would be wary of using this with truly heavy loads (like near the max listed). Being aluminum is great for being lighter weight, but will more likely fracture if over stressed.
customer_reviews.author: Erik R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck does not support the weight as advertised. My cart snapped in half trying to lift 500lbs
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great dolly, junk handle!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little dolly! I must say that the handle is junk if you’re going to lift anything near the weight limit! My handle bent the first 300 pounds! Now the handle is completely broken off! I’m going to see if they’ll send me a replacement handle. Good luck to me!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: A beast of a hand truck.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned dollies in the past and none compare to the Cosco. This thing is a beast I would feel comfortable moving just about anything with it. It came pre-assembled and trying to figure out the 3 different configurations took a couple of moments but once I knew how to do it no problem. Wheels are big and sturdy took the lip of the front door no problem and easily took a sharp turn. As I get older my desire to lift things and carry them has waned the Cosco hand truck is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: BEST MONEY I EVER SPENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different condo in the same complex - different building. My son said we could move all my stuff to the "new"place without paying a mover. I am a 60-something yr old woman in good shape but...what the heck. We used this hand truck to move EVERYTHING! When it is in the horizontal position you can stack plastic bins to make moving dishes/pots and pans/ and the like a breeze. We moved my 7' sofa across the parking lot to the "new" building with this thing. After 2 bedrooms of furniture/clothing/etc. it is still like brand new. It took us most of a Saturday but so much better than the $1000.00+++ the movers wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great design and build quality
customer_reviews.text: My family is getting our home ready to move out-of-state, so we have been boxing and stacking our belongings in the garage, and discovered this to be the HAND TRUCK OF MY DREAMS!!!!! Great "build quality", and the extended aluminum plate that fits under the load is at least 50% "deeper" than on hand trucks I have rented in the past, so no more "box blowouts". Only thing I wish it had was a strap system for large upright cargo, but the Big Box stores carry ratcheting cargo straps if you need that type of functionality to move a refrigerator, etc. Now, if only I could use it to move my wife's upright grand piano...
customer_reviews.author: James W. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Handle feels wobbly...
customer_reviews.text: After a friend loaned me her dolly to use in a recent move, I was so impressed that i looked to find the exact dolly for myself. I thought that was this--features are the same, this one says Costco a few more places than I remember it being on hers, but really thought it was the same wonderfully sturdy dolly i just used. It's not. The handle just feels wobblier when it's configured for long flat loads. If I could even begin to figure out how to get this back into the box and to a ups or wherever I'd need to go, I'd probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: barrymanglow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I moved a 750LB safe with no problems. Moved twice it's been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: david jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little mover
customer_reviews.text: As a 60+ single, out of shape woman this really helps me move things when I need to without asking people to help me. It is a little bulky but I manage to move cabinets and boxes that there is no way I could lift. I do wish the platform would fold for storage but that is a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: JLBRN

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one week
customer_reviews.text: I received my hand truck December 1. December 8 it was broke. The rivets popped out of on handle. This is unacceptable. My hope is that Cosco refunds or replaces with stronger rivets. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It’s a true 3-position hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable build quality! I can’t believe this thing weighing 27.5 lbs can handle 1000 lbs, but it could. High quality casters and wheels along with a solid aluminum welded frame. I bought it for the 45 degree hand truck feature which makes hauling my music equipment a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: D. Albright

customer_reviews.title: I Have Two
customer_reviews.text: These things are solid and very useful due to the different options. I have one at work and one at home. Have hauled many hundreds of pounds on them without issues. They are both predominantly used in the horizontal flat position. You can easily move anywhere from 0-500 LBs with this. Great for appliances also, that 45 degree angle option is sweet.. But yo, be smart - use a strap(s) and have someone spot you while you work with heavy weight on this thing. Don't be the guy that is known for death via hand truck. For real.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled upon occasion

customer_reviews.title: This is so sturdy. I lifted a fridge and my 5' safe
customer_reviews.text: This is so sturdy. I lifted a fridge and my 5' safe. No bending or breaking. No problems at all. Dimpling amazing product. This safe must weight 200+ pounds and it lifted it like nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phillips

customer_reviews.title: All-around awesome handtruck
customer_reviews.text: I love this dolly, handtruck. I love how easily you can transform it into three positions. I also love how easy it is to maneuver because of the small swivel wheels, can be maneuvered with Single hand. I would like to also mention that the seller is an awesome person who has excellent customer service habits. Thank you very much for the smooth transaction
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dolly
customer_reviews.text: Got this in preparation for a move, and am glad I got it. Able to move several hundred pounds of boxes with minimal effort. The laydown function has made it super easy to stack boxes and push them up a truck ramp with no fear of the dolly failing. My wife likes the tilt setting as it makes it easier for her shorter frame to get the leverage she needs to get the weight on the wheels. I'd recommend this to anyone who needs a dolly.
customer_reviews.author: AtHomeCraftsman

customer_reviews.title: Good but wobbly handle.
customer_reviews.text: The problem is lot of the cosco models look very alike with slight variations. We got the wrong one. This is good except the handle when you move is wobbly. Unlike the other cosco model where the handle is connected together.
customer_reviews.author: TonyP

customer_reviews.title: It rattles and wobbles
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this hand truck but it doesn't seem that stable to me. It rattles and the wheels wobble. Also the platform really needs to be larger for most lifting. I think this is one of those items that is best shopped for in person.
customer_reviews.author: R F Barchiesi

customer_reviews.title: What a great helper!
customer_reviews.text: What a great helper!! I got more than I paid for in this purchase. It converts to the lay down position and I can really load it up. I've tied a 12' foot rope to it for it's standing position and it makes a handy leash in it's laying down position. It has an oversize bottom plate for the large and heavy stuff like refrigerators and stoves. The pneumatic tires handle bumps easily and rust will never be a problem. Hey, cheapskate!!, spend a little more, get a lot more........Rusty
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: If you have big stuff, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I borrowed one from a friend for my move after helping him move a large gun safe with his. I was doing a 1-way move of about 1,700 miles and couldn't borrow his without shipping it back to him, so I bought my own. This thing was instrumental in being able to get our new, very large, refrigerator through all of the necessary doorways without damaging it or the houses. I also used it on two very heavy cabinet style tool chests and lots of other normal furniture. I wish I'd had one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Value beyond my initial purchase
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to help us move into our new home, boxes and totes etc.. BUT...holy cow, I've moved 3 fridges a freezer and a stove MYSELF! this thing is amazing and has helped us tremendously. its now employed to bring the groceries in the home in the flatbed configuration. also will be using to load firewood, and MORE. LOVE LOVE LOVE this.
customer_reviews.author: Pappa Pots

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment after spending $150+ on a product
customer_reviews.text: Aluminum on the tilt back bent after first use... Only had 325 lbs on it, it states that it supports 1000 when in four wheel configuration. Big disappointment after spending $150+ on a product. May have had a faulty unit, but didn't use until after the return policy was up.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything about it but the tires!
customer_reviews.text: I love the solidness of this dolly, and the size is great. I also like the flexibility of the positions it can move items. The only negative thing I don't care for at all is the tires... kind of plastic like and rigid. Would have rated five stars had they been rubber... otherwise, I will have this for many years to come... will probably switch out the tires to make it the way I want it and the way it should have been from the get go in a few weeks when I get more time. Overall, I am happy thou and a good value despite the tire issue.
customer_reviews.author: McGyver911

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have bought four different types of hand trucks. One for garage, one for house and one for office. I have away the 4th one. This one is the best. It is light and is easily changeable to different position. The others cannot be chanted as easily as this one. If you are looking for hand trim, don’t look around. I did and I eventually got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I love this things. I had a standard hardware store utility cart that I was always having to inflate the tires on and was steel, so a lot heavier. This things a little powerhouse and no more killing my back moving a frig since it leans back to hold things like that for you. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for apartment moving
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck was indispensable for an apartment move. I did not have to move any very heavy objects e.g. safes over 500LBs as some people have done but certainly did move a multitude of very heavy and awkward objects with ease with this hand truck. It was easy to change the hand truck between the different position to accommodate different loads. I could not have done the move without it unless I paid movers. Well worth the money and I would happily recommend for similar usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dom P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy dolly. I am a woman who is 5'2" and have used this to move heavy furniture and other household items. The dolly itself is heavy but not too heavy for me to carry around to different parts of the house to move heavy items. I recently used it to move a very heavy tv console and had no problems moving it to another part of the room. I'm glad I purchased this, it has saved my back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea in Boston

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this hand truck!! It is well built, and light weight for the amount it is capable of carrying. It is extremely easy to shift from upright to the flat position, as well as the 45 degree angle. I've put it to work already and it was easily manœuvrable along an uneven path. There was a few day delay receiving it, but there had been a warning about the delay prior to my purchasing it, so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: B. Murray

customer_reviews.title: good handtruck
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to haul around boxes of frozen bread loaves. It works well for us, esp. the horizontal set-up. The unit is made of aluminum and well built. That said, I could see how it might not be sturdy enough for heavy weights. But for our 200-300 lbs weights, it's perfect. The wheels are solid rubber, not air. Less maintenance, but a rougher ride. All in all, we are happy and feel it's good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Could not even get it to my house without the axle bending not good sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Garrison H.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our apartment move. We are a retired couple going from a home to apartment this came in so handy. Very sturdy. Very versatile. Just right for a families’ quick needs. This little tool is continuing to get use and we are able to hide in a corner of our storage without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Gagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to move things with this. I got it for my dad and he is an older guy that is always moving furniture as a side business and it really helps him out.
customer_reviews.author: Jigmaster

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality / weak design
customer_reviews.text: Returned this unit the day it was received. Missing most of the rear wheel bearings and frame assembly rivets coming loose even before using. Would not feel safe using this anywhere near the stated rating.
customer_reviews.author: aq4me

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Only had the hand truck for about a week but so far this thing is great! Easy to use and very lightweight. I love the three positions and will use them all eventually. I bought this for personal use around my home and garage and for a potential move. Don't yet know how much it will hold, and last under heavy usage, but so far I think it will work very well. Sure beats the rental options.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these to move boxes around our warehouse. Within 2 months, one frame snapped completely and another frame bent. This is from 50lb boxes!!! Nowhere near the advertised rated capacity. Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Bouncers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but a tad short
customer_reviews.text: Over all this dolly is probably the best around you’ll find. The maneuverability is out of this world. Made moving my double wide fridge, wash and dryer seem like easy. I biggest complaint is the over all height. I’m 6’2” and the handles sit pretty low when dealing with a 6ft fridge. If those were adjustable as well I think it would rock. That and real tires at the bottom not plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C. Long

customer_reviews.title: does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do, but i'm not sure about the claims of it carrying 1000lb. The metal seems pretty thin, some parts are plastic. I definitely would not attempt to carry something that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal_positive

customer_reviews.title: It works well and I'm satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: It works well and I'm satisfied with it , but it arrived with the handle bent. It's still usable but I need it on a daily basis and don't really want to wait for it to ship back and forth even if the seller would cover the cost. Seller maybe should consider putting it inside a box or protecting it in some way while it's shipped. I'm pretty sure that's how the one I have was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Indispensible for moving
customer_reviews.text: Just used this to move 3 large 26' trucks of sometimes heavy furniture and boxes and this saved soooo much work. I am 50 years old and not sure I would have survived the ordeal without this. My wife has a very heavy outdoor Iron bench and I put a 2x4 between the legs and rolled it across the back yard onto the truck no problem. I like that the tires are non-pneumatic so it is always ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Heath

customer_reviews.title: Tough but light
customer_reviews.text: It's tougher than you think, moved a very large wood burning cast iron fireplace/ stove down stairs into the back of a truck, across a field and off the pick up to it's final resting home. Stove weights over 500 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: CM Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Great hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Great hand truck. I have used it to so far carry 2 pinball machines down a slope into my walkout basement. Worked great. The extra wheels at the back helps a lot. I have 3 more machines coming, lets see if it holds up, but saves me money and time asking for someone else to help!
customer_reviews.author: moman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Simple to change the configuration for different needs. Very sturdy, good value, love the flat free wheels. I use it to move odd heavy stuff and some furniture. I have not tried something like a refrigerator. Well made. Use with in the manufactures load limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Rainkntry

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: This dolly has been wonderful for us! We move a lot of furniture in our business, and it's sturdy enough to handle the larget pieces, yet lightweight and easy to store when not in use. We love the extra features that let you change the angle and lean your pieces back on the secondary wheels. Work smarter not harder. The only thing we wish for is that the handles were a little longer. When we use it in the tilted back position, you have to bend much lower to maneuver the dolly around. I still think we made the best all around choice!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This was so helpful and I found it to be quite sturdy. I put a large tub (80lbs) and two 6ft grid cage walls on it that I take to conventions. Now I’ve only used this for three conventions in the past 3-4 years I’ve had it, so it hasn’t had too much extensive labor. But I like the fact it can be changed into three different positions which I know will come in handy for more conventions down the road. It beats having to drag everything on a tiny trolley.
customer_reviews.author: Synclaire

customer_reviews.title: Be careful which model you order.
customer_reviews.text: Great cart but be careful, the descriptions and photos for this product are for the four in one model, the three in one model does not have the assisted 4-wheel hand truck feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Paschke

customer_reviews.title: Quailty
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed by the quality of the product. Loose wheels, Cheap construction. The product is only worth about $50.00. Not $150.00. highly dissatisfied. Please reimburse me at least $100. Don Schroeder
customer_reviews.author: Heidverm

customer_reviews.title: Nice handtruck
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the front wheel began to come apart. They still roll well, but will need to be replace much sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I bought a cart just like this about 6 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cart just like this about 6 years ago. The cart is the best thing that ever happened to me...it carries about 250 lbs of equipment every day. I was disappointed because it has plastic wheels. My old cart has large rubber wheels and I think it helps the cart maneuver better. Bring back the rubber wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Everything it says it is....
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This old lady absolutely loves having a dolly that doesn't weigh more than what I'm moving. Nice size--I'm short, but I can use it easily. Haven't used it as a cart yet, but I will add on when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Tedra Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Truck/Dolly Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best value for the best dolly/hand truck I have seen. It is a really great work horse and does the job beautifully. I use it to put all my boxes and supplies for my tables at Comic and Fantasy Conventions. I use all 3 configurations and can say that it is by far the most versatile and strong hand truck I could have asked for. Highly Recommend It!
customer_reviews.author: CharacterArtGuy

customer_reviews.title: This cart is great! Strong
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great! Strong, durable, relatively lightweight. The metal shelf is deep and hasn't bent under a heavy load. The option to use it in 3 different positions has been very handy. My only complaint is I wish it was about 6" longer. Or had the ability to extend at the top. It would make it a lot easier to move larger objects or more boxes more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Like the weight of it and size of bottom playform
customer_reviews.text: Product worked okay, but feels flimsy and loose at junctions. My son said when felt of it" this will not last". Like the weight of it and size of bottom playform. Used it to move some heavy boxes this past weekend in the cart position exclusively and it worked well. Four stars because of seeming looseness of components and dubiable construction.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo985

customer_reviews.title: real review
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap lots of play in the pins....I had to grease the smaller wheels and they are still tuff when turning in convertible mode...I love that its lightweight I wouldn't trust it with anything more than 250lbs If you want a serious dolly go with magliner but you will pay for it
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Coleman

customer_reviews.title: OK, but handles are too short
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hand truck for the price. My only issue is the handle grips are a bit too low during use to be comfortable when carrying a load unless you're about 5' 2". If they extended them up a bit it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mavwrik

customer_reviews.title: major improvement
customer_reviews.text: The versatility and lightness is great. Only reason I didn't give a 5th star was because there is no strap. I have lots of bungee cords and ratchet straps so when needed I supplement.
customer_reviews.author: jdswift

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cart to move a body shop hobby saw mill the contents of a 3 bedroom house and garage plus a large barn, this thing held up and is still like new, one of the best purchases we have made in years
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart. So easy to move from one position to another. Like the lightweight but sturdy construction. Will make loading in and out of art shows much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Pam White

customer_reviews.title: The most important part to know is that it has 3 positions of usage
customer_reviews.text: There are no cons here. This product is strong and sturdy. It does the job. Just bare in mind that with usage of hauling refrigerators and washer and dryers in a 25 degree angle, you do have to hold down on the top portion of the hand truck due to these items being bottom heavy. Easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made, well worth the money. The wheels, should they ever go flat (and they eventually will having employed a number of these over the years) are easily replaceable, you can find them at Home Depot or Lowe's for about $25 USD.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: ... Cosco 3 in 1 Hand Cart has been working great for our Route Personnel
customer_reviews.text: The Cosco 3 in 1 Hand Cart has been working great for our Route Personnel...it is lightweight, easy to operate and can handle heavy loads with ease. We have always had issues with the pneumatic tires that came on other carts going flat or blowing out under heavier loads...I like the fact that this cart has solid rubber tires that do not compress and make it more difficult to push/pull under heavier loads. Overall very satisfied!!!,
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Adamson

customer_reviews.title: So useful we gave ours to a parent and bought another.
customer_reviews.text: We found this to be much easier to use than we expected. It is not terribly heavy but it is very sturdy and ultra versatile. You can angle down extra casters and roll the item along sidewalks and through doorways and such, in addition to the ability to use it in a cart formation or like a refrigerator truck. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: vikioviki

customer_reviews.title: Good for big items, but not for LARGE items.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that it didn't come with a strap, or a place to attached one. It is sturdy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Whayden

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of these dolly's for work and I like them. I don't like the handle as much ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these dolly's for work and I like them. I don't like the handle as much as one that I got from Uline but they were cheaper and the floor plate is bigger so that is a plus. I also REALLY like that you can put these at an angle as well as upright and flat.That makes it super handy for moving boxes and crossing streets with them in front of you. Overall good buy. Very durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck is very compact. It is really cool to use. Figuring out how to bring it into a cart was a bit tricky. But once you get the hang of it assembling and disassembling it is quite easy. It is a bit hard to maneuver when is it a cart. only because it has the big wheels on the back. Otherwise, it is great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Perez =]

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This truck is heavy duty and very well constructed. I use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: It helps in just everyday life but especially for the garden
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Debruhl

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Made two moves with this dolly. It would appear to be heavy, however its not. The support wheels in the leaned back position is why I bought this, they are perfect in taking the load off of you. I would recommend this product, good quality, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I’m getting one for my other stores.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We are a restaurant and have big catering projects...this hits the spot. Shows up all together...no cotter pins to lose...smart design
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has made my job so much easier! I’m a medical courier for a large hospital and haul so many different types of items. its amazing how many people comment on a dolly!
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: Great for home use. Won't hold up for commercial use (my guess) Worked great to get us through a move. Casters seem "meh" but we didn't abuse the cart and it's holding up fine. Might not stand up to someone that just throws it around. ...but for general use by someone that takes care of it, I'd guess it'll last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Well made heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to move heavy items like 40 lb salt bags... then used it to move heavy stacks of firewood. Very durable ... glad I spent the extra $$ and bought this heavy duty hand cart.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Durham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after buying it the plastic latch at the top cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia, PA

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in all situations
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved quite a few things. The hand truck came in so handy and is so easy to use. We received lots of compliments from others who had never used one before. Love the WIDE flat plate to help secure items being moved. This was certainly a win win purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Good hand truck!
customer_reviews.text: Great dolly but needs better wheels. Possibly rubber instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Vizio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it's weight in gold! Very easy to use. We use it each and every Estate Sale & for setting up... which means we use it several times a week, every week. It has stood up to our rigorous demands & surpassed our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: I love this handcart
customer_reviews.text: I love this handcart! It can be converted into so many different different types of carts. I can move so many things by myself, even heavy objects! My sister has had one for years, when I found the exact one I couldn't wait until I got my own. Now I don't have to borrow hers any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it he has been using it for work to carry granite tops and it has worked wonderfully, so far he likes it and it has made his job a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dolly/cart. Very light weight and can hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dolly/cart. Very light weight and can hold up to 1000 lbs. With all the features it is perfect for anyone to haul anything. We ordered it for our office mainly for a very petite person to haul away big boxes and has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Goatsucker

customer_reviews.title: Great all around cart
customer_reviews.text: Extra large base, along with good sized tires make picking things up a snap
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly. Just as described! Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped quickly, arrived quickly, and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Khalidou Diallo

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable Hand Truck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he used it to move a 1000 lb. gun safe. Worked Great! Plan on using it to move a lot more things now that he knows how much weight it can handle.
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Well made hand truck, i bought it for $99 dollars, I was hunting for this guy for a while until I saw the lower price and presto!, in general, it does the job, happy customer
customer_reviews.author: OSORIOMEDIA

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Whole frame bent on small load. Normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Husband and son love this item
customer_reviews.text: Husband and son love this item. Ordered to help move items from the house to the garage since we were having the flooring replaced. Couldn't have done it without this. Highly recommend having this on hand for any type of moving. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Strong unit.Love it
customer_reviews.text: I do volunteer work for a local food pantry and this was the exact duplicate of one already in use. Love it's flexibility and weight capacity. Make my job a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Salato

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Best addition to our warehouse! It helps to move boxes easier and quicker! Plus it can hold up heavy weight, we felt so much more secured when moving around our merchandises than other dolly.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: The cart mode is great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this. Thought it was a weird purchase at the time. What would we need a hand truck at our house for? But ive actually used it a lot. The cart mode is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a good product here
customer_reviews.text: Axle bent under a 400lb safe... Now I have alignment drag from the crooked wheels... Almost a good product here..
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need. Easy to move heavy items. Easy to move outside plants, containers and other items. Lots of ways to configure it different items making it more useful..
customer_reviews.author: Richard Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great dolly
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about it being a Costco dolly but it's one of the best always have ever used and I have a large furniture dolly. I would definitely recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very hard to turn when using 4 wheels with any weight on it so better wheels would help. With better wheels it would be a 5 Star product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money!!!!! This was invaluable to our move. We have lots of large heavy furniture, couldnt have done it without this.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: very good dolly... but Costco has it way cheaper.. found out after using it
customer_reviews.author: mrkoshe

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome cart! We love how you can change the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cart! We love how you can change the positions. It makes it so easy to move things. Its sturdy and well made. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kern

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hand truck I have ever had. I love how it can be placed at an angle to move packages around so they don't fall off. The wheels are great and solid. It is so easy to use. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kale

product_meta.title: Cosco 3-in-1 Aluminum Hand Truck/Assisted Hand Truck/Cart w/ flat free wheels
product_meta.description: Size Name:3 in 1 XLLet this lightweight hand truck do all your heavy lifting. The ergonomic design makes it ideal for home or work. Easily converts to a 2-wheel upright, 4-wheel cart or assisted 4-wheel hand truck with just one hand no tools, no pins, no kidding.
feature_bullets: Ergonomic which reduces the chance of injury, fatigue and muscle strain
Easy to move with heavy-duty flat free wheels
Easy to use with quick one-hand conversion
1000 pound Capacity, Product Measurements: Height: 33.25", Width: 46.88", Depth: 19.75"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars922 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
